thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com
thread.title: Kathy Y, Arvada Colorado
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Kathy Y, Arvada Colorado

author: Kathy Y, Arvada Colorado
title: Kathy Y, Arvada Colorado
text: My order was recently delayed due to weather conditions. I contacted Vital Choice and she (wish I wrote down her name) was the most pleasant, helpful person I believe I've ever encountered. She corrected the issue and I received my product exactly when she said I would. This company has great customer service. I will be a long time customer.
